I had tried out Universe Sandbox last year around October time, and after it expired (demo version) I noticed it had a link to KSP.

I followed the link, downloaded the new .13 version, and I\'ve been hooked* ever since!

Joe 8)

*hooked: I last played Skyrim on 3rd Feb this year, and I LOVED Skyrim, that shows how much I love KSP!!!
Found it pretty late, but I found it through Northerlion
Saw it posted on a torrent website. I played a pirated version for a couple of days until I got the funds to grab the full version.

It was in a thread that was some sort of 'would you survive the zombies' quiz or something. One of the questions was to list the main character of the last video game you played and they would be your #1 teammate. Someone posted Jeb and said 'i\'m fwcked' and I was curious what the hell a kerbal was.

Went to check it out back when it was flavour of the month on /v/.

Was probably the first and last time that place actually motivated me to play a video game, too.
I\'m trying to get some YouTubers to play this game and get it popular.

my housemate watches kurtjmac (i didn't, not a fan of minecraft) he knew i had an interest in astronomy and he made me watch a couple of vids of ksp so i downloaded the demo and played it for a while and made youtube vids about it till i finally had the spare cash to buy the full version and i've been happily playing ever since.

I found out about KSP through the "Now Playing" article at PC Gamer.

http://www.pcgamer.com/2012/08/06/now-playing-reaching-for-the-stars-in-kerbal-space-program/

It immediately got me hooked. I downloaded the demo, tried it and two days later i bought the game.

Great game

I had always been searching for space simulators since I was about 12 and it just so happened that one day after watching a video on Moonbase alpha I found this in a related video, can't remember the channel name but I owe a lot to him for showing me a game I have wanted most of my life

I actually don't remmber anymore how I got onto KSP, I do know it's the kind of game I wanted since my first PC in 1994.

And on a side not we are getting Kurt J Kermin in the enxt update, including the 3d glasses.
